message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I can meet you halfway between $110 and $105, which would be $107.5. Would you be willing to accept that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105 again?

I'm not willing to go back to $105, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and $110, which would be $107.5 again. However, I can offer you a slight discount, so I'll meet you at $108. Would you be willing to accept that?
I appreciate your willingness to offer a discount, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $106?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $108, and I'm not willing to give up any more value. I'm willing to meet you at $108, but I need to make a profit, so I'm not going any lower. Would you be willing to accept that?
